name: linksh-monorepo
description: LinkSh URL Shortener - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
